items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.
items.title: jacobovidal/oauth-fetch: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.

items.content_html: Lightweight, expressive ORM for Node.js Sqlite.
items.title: AstroX11/Sinter: Lightweight, expressive ORM for Node.js Sqlite.

items.content_html: Task Nest is a lightweight and modern task management system designed to help users organize and track project-related tasks. It includes both a backend (Node.js + Express) and a dynamic frontend UI, built for developers and teams that want simple yet powerful task control.
items.title: Voxny404/tasknest: Task Nest is a lightweight and modern task management system designed to help users organize and track project-related tasks. It includes both a backend (Node.js + Express) and a dynamic frontend UI, built for developers and teams that want simple yet powerful task control.

items.title: usebruno/bruno: Opensource IDE For Exploring and Testing Api's (lightweight alternative to postman/insomnia)

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
items.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible custom React hook for managing subscriptions and status updates in your application. It helps you subscribe to a list of candidates, fetch their statuses, and keep them updated with polling and debounce functionality.
items.title: gautamgiri-dev/use-status-manager: A lightweight and flexible custom React hook for managing subscriptions and status updates in your application. It helps you subscribe to a list of candidates, fetch their statuses, and keep them updated with polling and debounce functionality.

items.content_html: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀
